Summary: ?? Poltava region - the threat of using ballistic weapons!

Forwarded From Commander of the Air Force Mykola Oleschuk?? 27 ATTACK UAVS SHOT DOWN ????????? On the night of August 9, 2024, the Russian occupiers attacked with attack UAVs of the "Shahed" type from the Primorsko-Akhtarsk region - Russian Air Force radio engineering troops 27 attack drones were detected and escorted. As a result of the anti-aircraft battle, all enemy UAVs were shot down by the mobile fire groups of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, anti-aircraft missile units and EW equipment of the Air Force in the Kyiv, Poltava, Sumy, Mykolaiv, Kherson, Donetsk and Dnipropetrovsk regions. Thank you for the combat work! ?? Together - to victory Air Force Commander Lieutenant General Mykola Oleschuk
Countering the threat of attack UAVs.
